name: Keep IN (itch)
description:
Your job is to Keep the ball IN the black shape untill the timer runs out, if at any given time it hits the white outer border you lose.

the minimalistic aspect of the game, was to build it with the least possible elements and even the elements are simple in terms of design, color and feel. 

Team

Raed Tabani -Unity Developer and Programmer

Mousa Raed -Unity Developer and Programmer/Designer
